name: SWARMED
description:
A little prototype I made in about a week.  Just a little something for anybody to play for a few minutes.  

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You're stranded on an island and you're about to be bombarded by a swarm of small droids. How many points can you rack up before you're eliminated? You'll have to avoid blaster fire, droids, and oncoming ships in order to survive and prevent yourself from being pushed off the sides of the island into oblivion.

=============================================================

CONTROLS:

WASD  ->  Move

Space  ->  Jump
